title: The First Ever Radio Hour - 4/18/22
itunes:title: The First Ever Radio Hour - 4/18/22
description:
Jeremy celebrates live albums / recordings from some his favorite performances! Includes songs by Nirvana, Bad Brains, Void, The National, Bob Dylan, Smoking Popes, Descendents, Black Flag, Leonard Cohen, Death Cab For Cutie and more!

Subscribe to the PATREON and receive a brand new radio hour every Sunday! Thats two additional episodes a month AND you get them a day early! You'll also see a complete list of songs played on this episode.

Follow the show on Instagram and Twitter!
